text: Frankly, my dear, I don’t give a damn.
name: Gone with the Wind

text: You know you’re getting old when the candles cost more than the cake.
name: Bob Hope

text: It’s LeviOsa, not LevioSA.
name: Hermione Granger

text: People say, ‘How you stay looking so young?’ I say, well, good lighting, good doctors, and good makeup.
name: Dolly Parton

text: I’m just one stomach flu away from my goal weight.
name: The Devil Wears Prada

text: A day without sunshine is like, you know, night.
name: Steve Martin

text: Houston, we have a problem.
name: Apollo 13

text: Trying is the first step toward failure.
name: Homer Simpson

text: Show me the money!
name: Jerry Maguire

text: I like long walks, especially when they are taken by people who annoy me.
name: Noel Coward

text: Adults are always asking children what they want to be when they grow up because they’re looking for ideas.
name: Paula Poundstone

text: May the Force be with you.
name: Star Wars

text: With great power comes great responsibility.
name: Spider-Man

text: People can’t drive you crazy if you don’t give them the keys.
name: Mike Bechtle

text: If at first you don’t succeed, try, try again. Then quit. No use being a damn fool about it.
name: W.C. Fields

text: I’m not bad. I’m just drawn that way.
name: Who Framed Roger Rabbit

text: When in doubt, look intelligent.
name: Garrison Keillor

text: According to the map, we’ve only gone four inches.
name: Dumb and Dumber

text: If you think your boss is stupid, remember: You wouldn’t have a job if he was any smarter.
name: John Gotti

text: When I was growing up, I always wanted to be someone. Now I realize I should have been more specific.
name: Lily Tomlin

text: I’m not insane. My mother had me tested.
name: Sheldon Cooper

text: Doing nothing is very hard to do…you never know when you’re finished.
name: Leslie Nielsen

text: Toto, I’ve a feeling we’re not in Kansas anymore.
name: The Wizard of Oz

text: People say nothing is impossible, but I do nothing every day.
name: Winnie-the-Pooh

text: No man goes before his time — unless the boss leaves early.
name: Groucho Marx

text: To infinity... and beyond!
name: Toy Story

text: Have you ever noticed that anybody driving slower than you is an idiot, and anyone going faster than you is a maniac?
name: George Carlin

text: Sometimes the appropriate response to reality is to go insane.
name: Philip K. Dick

text: I like my money where I can see it: hanging in my closet.
name: Carrie Bradshaw

text: Why do they call it rush hour when nothing moves?
name: Robin Williams

text: I’ll be back.
name: The Terminator

text: I never feel more alone than when I’m trying to put sunscreen on my back.
name: Jimmy Kimmel

text: Don’t be so humble — you're not that great.
name: Golda Meir

text: Let it go!
name: Frozen

text: In real life, I assure you, there is no such thing as algebra.
name: Fran Lebowitz

text: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.
name: Douglas Adams

text: Accept who you are. Unless you’re a serial killer.
name: Ellen DeGeneres

text: Whoever said that money can’t buy happiness, simply didn’t know where to go shopping.
name: Bo Derek

text: You shall not pass!
name: The Lord of the Rings

text: Before you criticize someone, walk a mile in their shoes. That way, you'll be a mile from them, and you'll have their shoes.
name: Jack Handy

text: I’m not great at the advice — can I interest you in a sarcastic comment?
name: Chandler Bing

text: I’m sick of following my dreams, man. I’m just going to ask where they’re going and hook up with ’em later.
name: Mitch Hedberg

text: All you need is love. But a little chocolate now and then doesn’t hurt.
name: Charles M. Schulz

text: Life is like a box of chocolates, you never know what you’re gonna get.
name: Forrest Gump

text: It is useless to try to hold a person to anything he says while he’s madly in love, drunk, or running for office.
name: Shirley MacLaine

text: The reason I talk to myself is because I’m the only one whose answers I accept.
name: George Carlin

text: My husband and I fell in love at first sight. Maybe I should have taken a second look.
name: Halley Reed

text: As I learned from growing up, you don’t mess with your grandmother.
name: Prince William

text: Nobody puts Baby in a corner.
name: Dirty Dancing

text: Why so serious?
name: The Dark Knight
